post:
At Own Box we offer Linux & Windows KVM VPS Hosting based in South-east London, UK. Our services are perfect for medium to big websites that uses a lot of database interaction, thanks to the super-fast SSD NVMe storage & our high frequency CPUs we use in our  nodes. Plus all plans come with Anti DDoS Protection and snapshot backups included so you can be assured that your services will always be online and you can restore your VPS any time with the snapshots you have taken via our client area.


**Low End VPS 1**
1/2 x2.2Ghz,
256 MB RAM,
10 GB SSD disk space,
1000GB Traffic 1Gbps port 100Mbps guaranteed,
1 IPv4 address,
24x7 UK based Support.
£8 a year 
[Order SSD VPS Now](https://www.ownbox.co.uk/linux-vps-hosting)

**FEATURES**
• Snapshot backups included.
• Reboot, Reinstall or configure VPS.
• Anti DDoS Protection & IPv6 included!
• Over 40 different Linux & Windows distributions to deploy.
• Super Fast SSD RAID Storage, on London, UK nodes.
• Guaranteed Hardware Resources.
• Upload your own ISOs.
• Instant Deployment
• UK Support.

Looking Glass: [lg-london.ownbox.co.uk](http://51.77.114.58/)

We give 2 months free for yearly payments and accept credit & debit cards (Stripe), PayPal and Bank transfers, If you got any questions about any of our services, please do not hesitate to contact us.
